questions_and_notes: Note that in general "area: mean" will give a lower maximum if data are mapped to a coarser grid than the original.  Consider reversing order of operations.
specific_issues: 8:Deprecate? Only 0 groups contributed this variable in CMIP6.
long_name: Maximum Wind Speed of Gust at 100m
comment: Wind speed gust maximum at 100m above surface
